short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches Amazon for a list of items and adds them to the cart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ultimate convenience in online shopping with "Shopping List," a Chrome extension designed to revolutionize your Amazon shopping experience. Forget the hassle of searching for products one by one or the tedious process of adding each item to your cart individually. With "Shopping List," you can do it all in a snap!

Key Features:
Quick Product Search: Our extension integrates seamlessly with Amazon, allowing you to find what you're looking for in seconds. No more endless scrolling or tab switching.

Bulk Add to Cart: Why add items one by one when you can add them all at once? Select multiple products and add them to your Amazon cart in a single click.

List Management: Create customized lists for different needsâ€”be it groceries, electronics, or home essentials. Keep your shopping organized and efficient.

Instant Price Comparison: As you add items to your list, get real-time price updates to ensure you're getting the best deals available.

User-Friendly Interface: With its intuitive design, "Shopping List" makes it easy for anyone to start using the extension right away.

Secure and Private: Your data is important to us. The extension is built with top-notch security features to protect your information.

One-Click Checkout: Once your list is ready, proceed to checkout on Amazon with a single click. It's that simple!

Customer Support: Our dedicated customer service team is always available to assist you with any queries or issues you may have.

"Shopping List" is not just another Chrome extension; it's a game-changer in online shopping. By offering a range of features aimed at simplifying and speeding up your Amazon shopping, this extension is a must-have for anyone who values convenience and efficiency. So why wait? Add "Shopping List" to your Chrome browser today and take your Amazon shopping to the next level!

Our product is compatible with Amazon services. We are not affiliated with or endorsed by Amazon.
